CustomField.description: IF book returned in time - show greeen flag, IF book not returned but in scope of allowed days - show yellow flag. IF book not returned and out of allowed days- show red flag.
CustomField.formula: IF(StartDate__c + DaysOfHoldAllowed__c >= ReturnedDate__c , IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif","green"), IF (AND(ISBLANK(ReturnedDate__c), TODAY() <= (StartDate__c + DaysOfHoldAllowed__c) ), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "yellow"), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "red")))
CustomField.label: Status
